name: api_login
description:
This function creates a session in our system which you will need to pass to
* most functions for authentication.

function.name: api_login
function.desc: This function creates a session in our system which you will need to pass to most functions for authentication.

username.name: username
username.description: the username (email address) you signed up with.

password.name: password
password.description: the password you use to login to the web account, or alternatively the API key.

input_comment:
* @param username string the username (email address) you signed up with.
* @param password string the password you use to login to the web account, or alternatively the API key.
